attributes.action: Stop the Union flag being brought into disrepute by divisive organisations.
attributes.additional_details: The Union flag is most often used by respected and admired organisations, like The British Legion. Certain right wing organisations  try to attribute authority to their message by using the flag at their demonstrations. This is an insult to those who have served under the Union Flag. The Indian subcontinent supplied the largest volunteer army ever, 1.2 million, 400,000 Islamic in WW2 winning 21 V.C.'s. The Poles provided 16 RAF squadrons with 303 squadron being the most successful of WW2.
attributes.background: The Union flag flies over all in the UK and is a symbol of unity. Some organizations on the extreme right are using this symbol to promote division. Recently a certain organisation of the right was using Union flags in a demonstration outside a mosque in London. This disrespects the flag.

rejection.details: In any case, we can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament does not have the power to determine who can and who can not use the national flags of the UK.
